title: Only received one icon from the first mission
body:
After completing the first mission (win a matchmade game) I have only received the chaos icon, but not the order icon.
https://i.gyazo.com/f90cd624096f8b9068bb40c666d20ce1.png
funnily enough I was using the Riven skin but only received yasuo's icon.. and I want to be on the good guys side :(

I have now received the other icon. Not sure if this was due to one of you amazing Rioters. Thanks.

replies.body: I also have this problem. I'm okay with waiting a bit for the Riven icon, I was just wondering if it was going to take a while or not.
I also only have the Yasuo icon and didn't get the Riven one after first mission? Help?

It looks like Riven is a wee bit slower than Yasuo xD!

Double check for the Dawnbringer Riven Icon and you should have it now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IAWmcJI2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-15T23:29:56.689+0000)
>
> It looks like Riven is a wee bit slower than Yasuo xD!
> 
> Double check for the Dawnbringer Riven Icon and you should have it now!

Yup I just checked and see I now have it. Thank you very much!
